entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 02:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -18.2°C
Wind: NE 36 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
